description: Request to rejoin an MLS conversation after local state loss

main.description: Submit rejoin request with fresh KeyPackage after state loss (e.g., app reinstall, device change)

keyPackage.description: Base64url-encoded fresh MLS KeyPackage for re-adding to the group

pending.description: Whether request is pending approval (true) or auto-approved (false)

errors.name: ConvoNotFound
errors.description: Conversation not found or user was never a member

errors.name: AlreadyMember
errors.description: User is already an active member with valid group state

errors.name: InvalidKeyPackage
errors.description: KeyPackage is malformed, expired, or invalid

errors.name: RateLimitExceeded
errors.description: Too many rejoin requests in short period
